Title: Relates to disputes between a surrogate and a hospital or individual health care provider
Summary: Relates to disputes between a surrogate and a hospital or individual health care provider; cites when the requirement of a provider to provide life-sustaining treatment following a surrogate's directive does not apply.
LawCode: Amd ยง2994-f, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to disputes between a surrogate and a hospital or individual health care provider
